item.description: Forest Park in Springfield, MA is one of the largest city parks in the country. Let's walk and explore it together! Bordered by Longmeadow on the south side it offers paved footpaths, hiking trails, a zoo and rose garden, ponds and waterfowl, and woodsy areas that are home to our urban wildlife. We'll meet in the Longmeadow Street parking lot, across from King Phillip's Stockade. Rain cancels. This event is a "go" with 3 other people on board as "yes" by Wednesday prior. For directions scroll down on this page: http://sidsrace4life....
item.how_to_find_us: I promise this is a recent photo of me :)
item.why: It's been a long winter and Spring is in the air.
item.name: Forest Park Walk
